titleStmt.title: The maid's tragedy altered with some other pieces / by Edmund Waller, Esq. ; not before printed in the several editions of his poems.
titleStmt.author: Waller, Edmund, 1606-1687.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
"Poems upon several occasions" running title: p. 47-77.
"Mr. Waller's speech to the House of Commons, April 22. 1640" p. 78-88.
